title: Customized Mathematics Simulation: Learner-Centered VR E-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge aligned with secondary education curricula and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Personalized learning environment for real-life and job-integrated mathematics problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners apply math problem-solving strategies tailored to their cognitive styles and preferences with 85% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners achieve a 70% or higher self-directed learning completion rate in personalized learning paths generated based on diagnostic data analyzed per learner.
Learners demonstrate real-world math application skills through project outcomes that incorporate peer evaluation and expert feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
